text: 16:18 Daniel 12:1; Akar Mogomem 4:5; 8:5; 11:13; 11:19Ezɨ overiamɨn onɨmariba taghtagha zuima, nɨgɨnir dafam overiamɨn otozɨ, arariba dagarvasi, ezɨ mɨkɨmkɨzir ekiam oto. Kar mɨkɨmkɨzir bar ekiam, fomɨra gumazamiziba otozir dughiamɨn iza datɨrɨghɨn tu, mɨkɨmkɨzir ekiar kamagh garitam fomɨra otozir puvatɨ.
